item.ssfm.kitchen_knife.tooltip: There is still some monkey fur...
item.ssfm.redstone_burger.tooltip: Redstone burger, How does it eat?
item.ssfm.universal_enzyme.tooltip: Did a dragon grow out of this?
item.ssfm.ghost_burger.tooltip: Prepared by the late Boris Klyuev.
item.ssfm.super_bite_burger.tooltip: One of these is capable of saturating the dragon of the end!
item.ssfm.bun_item.tooltip: Bun. Do you think there will be a hidden meaning?
item.ssfm.bun_item.tooltip2: This is just a wheat bun, grown in the French fields near Lyon,
item.ssfm.bun_item.tooltip3: harvested by the gentle hands of a coder,
item.ssfm.bun_item.tooltip4: ground in a mortar by some madman and baked in a thermal centrifuge
item.ssfm.fired_patty.tooltip: Cutlet fried in the oven in its own juice.
item.ssfm.fired_patty.tooltip2: Stop, how can you fry in the oven?
